definitions.definition: ( uncountable , chiefly Canada , US , Philippines ) Edible, sweet-tasting confectionery containing sugar , or sometimes artificial sweeteners , and often flavored with fruit, chocolate, nuts, herbs and spices, or artificial flavors.
( countable , chiefly Canada , US , Philippines ) A piece of confectionery of this kind.
( uncountable ) An accessory ( bracelet , etc.) made from pony beads , associated with the rave scene.

main_definition: ( uncountable , chiefly Canada , US , Philippines ) Edible, sweet-tasting confectionery containing sugar , or sometimes artificial sweeteners , and often flavored with fruit, chocolate, nuts, herbs and spices, or artificial flavors.
secondary_definitions: ( countable , chiefly Canada , US , Philippines ) A piece of confectionery of this kind.
( uncountable ) An accessory ( bracelet , etc.) made from pony beads , associated with the rave scene.

definitions.definition: A unit of weight used in southern India, equal to twenty maunds , roughly equal to 500 pounds avoirdupois but varying locally.

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A unit of weight used in southern India, equal to twenty maunds , roughly equal to 500 pounds avoirdupois but varying locally.
